Verify the navigation links are aligned right within the header
Check the 'Remember Me' checkbox is initially unchecked, its value is 'false', and it has a margin-right of 5px
Check its associated label text is 'Remember Me'
Verify when the 'Remember Me' checkbox is checked, its shape changes slightly to indicate selection, and its input value becomes 'true'

Verify the product description text uses font family 'Arial', has font size 15px, text color #333333, is text aligned 'justify', has a padding-top of 20px, padding-bottom of 20px, its line height is 1.6em, and its opacity is 1
Confirm the carousel displays exactly 3 slides, and its slide transition animation duration is 600ms
Verify the first slide in the carousel shows an image with source 'carousel_image_1.jpg'
Verify the 'Next' navigation button has an opacity of 0.8 and an aria-label 'Next slide'
Ensure the map widget displays 5 default markers, its initial zoom level is 12, has no visible watermark, and a border of 1px solid #CCC
Verify each marker on the map has a unique label
